name: RestWalker
description:
Description :

Loona is an adventure girl and she wants to explore the season world but she needs us to help her to explore and collect the coins!

Control Button :

  1. Right Arrow : Move to right
  2. Up Arrow : Jump
  3. Left Arrow :  You can't go back!

Tutorials:

  1. Use the control button above to move Loona
  2. There are a lot of things you must avoid by jump Loona but your coins will stay
  3. Avoid falling down from the obstacle or you need to restart the level
  4. Collect all the coins and boost up your coins by get into RED coin
  5. See your time to finish at the end of the game
  6. Also see your collected coins by press the coins stage or button reward at the end of the game
  7. Goodluck!

Link Gitlab :
